desc.en: After defeating the AMAS, Neru engages in a fearsome game of cat and mouse with Toki. Neru is eventually pinned down by Toki's ambush, and neither Midori or Yuzu are able to deal with the unexpected situation. Aris, who had been watching this all take place, makes an important decision.
desc.jp: After defeating the AMAS, Neru engages in a fearsome game of cat and mouse with Toki. Neru is eventually pinned down by Toki's ambush, and neither Midori or Yuzu are able to deal with the unexpected situation. Aris, who had been watching this all take place, makes an important decision.
desc.thai: After defeating the AMAS, Neru engages in a fearsome game of cat and mouse with Toki. Neru is eventually pinned down by Toki's ambush, and neither Midori or Yuzu are able to deal with the unexpected situation. Aris, who had been watching this all take place, makes an important decision.
desc.ko: After defeating the AMAS, Neru engages in a fearsome game of cat and mouse with Toki. Neru is eventually pinned down by Toki's ambush, and neither Midori or Yuzu are able to deal with the unexpected situation. Aris, who had been watching this all take place, makes an important decision.
desc.zh_tw: 擊倒AMAS，寧瑠和季展開了追逐戰。但最後寧瑠卻因為遭到季襲擊而倒下，綠和柚子也因為突如其來的狀況而措手不及。看見這一切情景後，愛麗絲做出重大的決定，並且向在場的所有人宣言。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 击倒AMAS，尼禄和时展开了追逐战。但最后尼禄却因为遭到时袭击而倒下，绿和柚子也因为突如其来的状况而措手不及。看见这一切情景后，爱丽丝做出重大的决定，并且向在场的所有人宣言。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 击倒AMAS，宁瑠和季展开了追逐战。但最后宁瑠却因为遭到季袭击而倒下，绿和柚子也因为突如其来的状况而措手不及。看见这一切情景后，爱丽丝做出重大的决定，并且向在场的所有人宣言。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 击倒AMAS，宁瑠和季展开了追逐战。但最后宁瑠却因为遭到季袭击而倒下，绿和柚子也因为突如其来的状况而措手不及。看见这一切情景后，爱丽丝做出重大的决定，并且向在场的所有人宣言。

desc.en: Neru said that the AMAS were nothing capable of, and Rio was forced to let Toki start repression. Toki, after switching the so-called "mode", became much more agile and knocked down Neru in no time.
desc.jp: Neru said that the AMAS were nothing capable of, and Rio was forced to let Toki start repression. Toki, after switching the so-called "mode", became much more agile and knocked down Neru in no time.
desc.thai: Neru said that the AMAS were nothing capable of, and Rio was forced to let Toki start repression. Toki, after switching the so-called "mode", became much more agile and knocked down Neru in no time.
desc.ko: Neru said that the AMAS were nothing capable of, and Rio was forced to let Toki start repression. Toki, after switching the so-called "mode", became much more agile and knocked down Neru in no time.
desc.zh_tw: 寧瑠表示AMAS不值一提，莉央無奈只能正式讓季開始壓制。切換了所謂“模式”的季動作達到了前所未有的敏捷，瞬間就將寧瑠打倒並壓制。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 尼禄表示AMAS不值一提，莉央无奈只能正式让时开始压制。切换了所谓“模式”的时动作达到了前所未有的敏捷，瞬间就将尼禄打倒并压制。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 宁瑠表示AMAS不值一提，莉央无奈只能正式让季开始压制。切换了所谓“模式”的季动作达到了前所未有的敏捷，瞬间就将宁瑠打倒并压制。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 宁瑠表示AMAS不值一提，莉央无奈只能正式让季开始压制。切换了所谓“模式”的季动作达到了前所未有的敏捷，瞬间就将宁瑠打倒并压制。

desc.en: Rio is the former president of Seminar of Millennium Science School, who resigned after the incidents happened in Volume 2. She is the creator of the Eridu City, a fortress city designed to prevent crisis against Kivotos.

desc.zh_tw: 莉音是千年科學學院研討會的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件發生後引咎辭職。她是Eridu，一個被建造用來抵禦基沃託斯威脅的城市的創造者。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 莉央是千年科学学院研讨会的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件发生后引咎辞职。她是Eridu，一个被建造用来抵御基沃托斯威胁的城市的创造者。

desc.en: After suppressing Neru, Rio instructed AMAS to retrieve Aris. Yuzu and Midori attempted to stop but received harsh warnings from Rio. Sensei asked Rio to stop, but got questioned instead that, "Shouldn't the adults understand her better?" Sensei argued that he should "protect the students" but got questioned more seriously instead.
desc.jp: After suppressing Neru, Rio instructed AMAS to retrieve Aris. Yuzu and Midori attempted to stop but received harsh warnings from Rio. Sensei asked Rio to stop, but got questioned instead that, "Shouldn't the adults understand her better?" Sensei argued that he should "protect the students" but got questioned more seriously instead.
desc.thai: After suppressing Neru, Rio instructed AMAS to retrieve Aris. Yuzu and Midori attempted to stop but received harsh warnings from Rio. Sensei asked Rio to stop, but got questioned instead that, "Shouldn't the adults understand her better?" Sensei argued that he should "protect the students" but got questioned more seriously instead.
desc.ko: After suppressing Neru, Rio instructed AMAS to retrieve Aris. Yuzu and Midori attempted to stop but received harsh warnings from Rio. Sensei asked Rio to stop, but got questioned instead that, "Shouldn't the adults understand her better?" Sensei argued that he should "protect the students" but got questioned more seriously instead.
desc.zh_tw: 寧瑠被壓制後，莉央指示AMAS去回收愛麗絲。柚子和綠試圖阻止，但遭莉央嚴厲警告。老師讓莉央住手，莉央反問老師作為大人更應理解她才對，但老師以“保護學生”為由爭論，遭到莉央的強烈質問。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 尼禄被压制后，莉央指示AMAS去回收爱丽丝。柚子和绿试图阻止，但遭莉央严厉警告。老师让莉央住手，莉央反问老师作为大人更应理解她才对，但老师以“保护学生”为由争论，遭到莉央的强烈质问。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 宁瑠被压制后，莉央指示AMAS去回收爱丽丝。柚子和绿试图阻止，但遭莉央严厉警告。老师让莉央住手，莉央反问老师作为大人更应理解她才对，但老师以“保护学生”为由争论，遭到莉央的强烈质问。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 宁瑠被压制后，莉央指示AMAS去回收爱丽丝。柚子和绿试图阻止，但遭莉央严厉警告。老师让莉央住手，莉央反问老师作为大人更应理解她才对，但老师以“保护学生”为由争论，遭到莉央的强烈质问。

desc.en: Rio stressed that sacrificing one to save the others are nowhere near being a fault, and talked again about the identity of Aris. Midori tried to argue with the symbol of a hero, aka the Sword of Light created by the Engineering Department; but Rio shut it down remotely and made the excuse ineffective against that. Neru called for Aris to not give up but didn't work. Aris remembered everyone and was afraid to harm anyone anymore. At last she agreed to go with Rio. The others felt down but were powerless to do anything.
desc.jp: Rio stressed that sacrificing one to save the others are nowhere near being a fault, and talked again about the identity of Aris. Midori tried to argue with the symbol of a hero, aka the Sword of Light created by the Engineering Department; but Rio shut it down remotely and made the excuse ineffective against that. Neru called for Aris to not give up but didn't work. Aris remembered everyone and was afraid to harm anyone anymore. At last she agreed to go with Rio. The others felt down but were powerless to do anything.
desc.thai: Rio stressed that sacrificing one to save the others are nowhere near being a fault, and talked again about the identity of Aris. Midori tried to argue with the symbol of a hero, aka the Sword of Light created by the Engineering Department; but Rio shut it down remotely and made the excuse ineffective against that. Neru called for Aris to not give up but didn't work. Aris remembered everyone and was afraid to harm anyone anymore. At last she agreed to go with Rio. The others felt down but were powerless to do anything.
desc.ko: Rio stressed that sacrificing one to save the others are nowhere near being a fault, and talked again about the identity of Aris. Midori tried to argue with the symbol of a hero, aka the Sword of Light created by the Engineering Department; but Rio shut it down remotely and made the excuse ineffective against that. Neru called for Aris to not give up but didn't work. Aris remembered everyone and was afraid to harm anyone anymore. At last she agreed to go with Rio. The others felt down but were powerless to do anything.
desc.zh_tw: 莉央強調犧牲一人為其他人的做法是正確的，並且再次申明瞭愛麗絲的身份。綠試圖以工程部的軌道炮為“勇者”的證明理論，但莉央遠端關閉了電源，這一證明被無效化。寧瑠在一旁督促愛麗絲不要放棄，但最終並未如願。愛麗絲會想起種種，擔心再給大家帶來傷害，最後同意與會長走，其他人雖然失落但也毫無他法。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 莉央强调牺牲一人为其他人的做法是正确的，并且再次申明了爱丽丝的身份。绿试图以工程部的轨道炮为“勇者”的证明理论，但莉央远程关闭了电源，这一证明被无效化。尼禄在一旁督促爱丽丝不要放弃，但最终并未如愿。爱丽丝会想起种种，担心再给大家带来伤害，最后同意与会长走，其他人虽然失落但也毫无他法。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 莉央强调牺牲一人为其他人的做法是正确的，并且再次申明了爱丽丝的身份。绿试图以工程部的轨道炮为“勇者”的证明理论，但莉央远程关闭了电源，这一证明被无效化。宁瑠在一旁督促爱丽丝不要放弃，但最终并未如愿。爱丽丝会想起种种，担心再给大家带来伤害，最后同意与会长走，其他人虽然失落但也毫无他法。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 莉央强调牺牲一人为其他人的做法是正确的，并且再次申明了爱丽丝的身份。绿试图以工程部的轨道炮为“勇者”的证明理论，但莉央远程关闭了电源，这一证明被无效化。宁瑠在一旁督促爱丽丝不要放弃，但最终并未如愿。爱丽丝会想起种种，担心再给大家带来伤害，最后同意与会长走，其他人虽然失落但也毫无他法。

desc.en: Aris accepted what Rio had said, and tried to explain to everyone in her words, hoping that everyone could understand her choice. Aris expressed her thanks for everyone accompanying her, and said that she was happy all the time.
desc.jp: Aris accepted what Rio had said, and tried to explain to everyone in her words, hoping that everyone could understand her choice. Aris expressed her thanks for everyone accompanying her, and said that she was happy all the time.
desc.thai: Aris accepted what Rio had said, and tried to explain to everyone in her words, hoping that everyone could understand her choice. Aris expressed her thanks for everyone accompanying her, and said that she was happy all the time.
desc.ko: Aris accepted what Rio had said, and tried to explain to everyone in her words, hoping that everyone could understand her choice. Aris expressed her thanks for everyone accompanying her, and said that she was happy all the time.
desc.zh_tw: 愛麗絲接受了莉央的話，並試圖向大家重新解釋，希望所有人能夠理解她的選擇。愛麗絲表達了對眾人一直陪伴著她的謝意，表示自己一直以來都很開心。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 爱丽丝接受了莉央的话，并试图向大家重新解释，希望所有人能够理解她的选择。爱丽丝表达了对众人一直陪伴着她的谢意，表示自己一直以来都很开心。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 爱丽丝接受了莉央的话，并试图向大家重新解释，希望所有人能够理解她的选择。爱丽丝表达了对众人一直陪伴着她的谢意，表示自己一直以来都很开心。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 爱丽丝接受了莉央的话，并试图向大家重新解释，希望所有人能够理解她的选择。爱丽丝表达了对众人一直陪伴着她的谢意，表示自己一直以来都很开心。

desc.en: Not until Rio's left could anyone move even a finger. Everyone was crashed with a feeling of powerlessness. Aris, had since gone long.
desc.jp: Not until Rio's left could anyone move even a finger. Everyone was crashed with a feeling of powerlessness. Aris, had since gone long.
desc.thai: Not until Rio's left could anyone move even a finger. Everyone was crashed with a feeling of powerlessness. Aris, had since gone long.
desc.ko: Not until Rio's left could anyone move even a finger. Everyone was crashed with a feeling of powerlessness. Aris, had since gone long.
desc.zh_tw: 直到莉央走前，所有人都被壓制的死死的，一根手指頭都動不了。眾人被無力感壓垮。愛麗絲，就此不見。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 直到莉央走前，所有人都被压制的死死的，一根手指头都动不了。众人被无力感压垮。爱丽丝，就此不见。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 直到莉央走前，所有人都被压制的死死的，一根手指头都动不了。众人被无力感压垮。爱丽丝，就此不见。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 直到莉央走前，所有人都被压制的死死的，一根手指头都动不了。众人被无力感压垮。爱丽丝，就此不见。

desc.en: Rio is the former president of Seminar of Millennium Science School, who resigned after the incidents happened in Volume 2. She is the creator of the Eridu City, a fortress city designed to prevent crisis against Kivotos.
desc.jp: Rio is the former president of Seminar of Millennium Science School, who resigned after the incidents happened in Volume 2. She is the creator of the Eridu City, a fortress city designed to prevent crisis against Kivotos.
desc.thai: Rio is the former president of Seminar of Millennium Science School, who resigned after the incidents happened in Volume 2. She is the creator of the Eridu City, a fortress city designed to prevent crisis against Kivotos.
desc.ko: Rio is the former president of Seminar of Millennium Science School, who resigned after the incidents happened in Volume 2. She is the creator of the Eridu City, a fortress city designed to prevent crisis against Kivotos.
desc.zh_tw: 莉音是千年科學學院研討會的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件發生後引咎辭職。她是Eridu，一個被建造用來抵禦基沃託斯威脅的城市的創造者。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 莉央是千年科学学院研讨会的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件发生后引咎辞职。她是Eridu，一个被建造用来抵御基沃托斯威胁的城市的创造者。
